name: CHaoSPliCAtiON
description:
A game Created for the Brackeys GameJam 2021.2. the them was let there be Chaos.

I Started this project with the goal of making a good looking game, let me know if i have completed it.

All is lost in a world where some mysterious creatures have taken over, humanity has soon discovered if you kill on it will split into 2. how can this be. you dont know but you are the last surviving human and will fight to the last. for you will not die a coward, but rather punching all you can.

Controls;

WASD-Move

Space-Jump

Left Mouse - Punch

Hit Subscribe to my devlog Channel  to see how i made this game in 7 days https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5TmjPQf_5Gp70Ng2gOLtnQ

and hit subscribe on my 2nd CHannel where i will be playing and reviewing other game GameJam Submissions

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCStwPa0foJFxhoywHBCEa0g
